name: Slime and Machinegun
description:
When a horde of slimes threatens the village's precious carrot fields, a brave man takes up arms to defend his home.

In this action-packed game, you'll use an arsenal of increasingly powerful firearms to battle waves of slimes and restore peace to the fields. With its unique blend of survival and bullet-hell elements, this game offers a thrilling and challenging experience.

Easy to control with just one finger and designed for a quick play-through, this game can be completed in just 1-2 hours. Grab your machine gun and defend the village from the slime invasion!
